column4: I'm using gnome terminal to ssh to a server where im running irssi, and when I try to press alt-t for the 14th window, gnome-terminal doesn't send this to irssi, but instead opens its own menu. Any fix?
change the shortcuts in the gnome-terminal menue or use /win 14
Ah, thx. Embarrasing that I didn't see that myself :P
